DOC.brief_summary: This 2 arm study investigate efficacy safety addition bevacizumab ( Avastin® ) current standard care ( multimodality therapy concurrent radiotherapy plus temozolomide follow adjuvant temozolomide ) compare current standard care alone . Patients randomly assign either Avastin® ( 10 mg/kg iv q2w ) placebo arm , combination radiation therapy ( total dose 60 Gy , administer 2 Gy fraction , 5 days/week ) plus temozolomide ( 75 mg/m2 po daily ) 6 week . After 4 week treatment break , patient continue receive Avastin® ( 10 mg/kg iv q2w ) placebo , plus temozolomide ( 150-200 mg/m2 po daily day 1-5 4 week cycle ) 6 cycle maintenance treatment . Following maintenance phase , Avastin® ( 15 mg/kg iv q3w ) placebo monotherapy continue . The anticipated time study treatment disease progression/unacceptable toxicity .
